articles.description: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — San Francisco played a critical role in fighting AIDS in America and around the world, leaders and activists said Saturday at a ceremony to mark the 40th anniversary of the first reported cases of the illness. Mayor London Breed and…

articles.description: The parents of two American girls were horrified and shocked to learn their kids had sneaked out of the family home in West Jordan in Utah in the middle of the night.
